heading: # Parallax
headingText: The `v-parallax` component creates a 3d effect that makes an image appear to scroll slower than the window.

usage.desc: A parallax causes a shift in a background image when the user scrolls the page.

content.heading: ### With content
content.desc: You can also place any content inside of the parallax. This allows you to use the parallax as a hero image.

custom-height.heading: ### Custom height
custom-height.desc: You can specify a custom height on a parallax. Keep in mind this can break the parallax if your image is not sized properly

props.alt: Attaches an alt property to the parallax image
